## Action On Tame Hit

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/action_on_tame_hit).

Runs an action when an owner's `TameableEntity` harms a target.

Type ID: `apugli:action_on_tame_hit`
